attributes.action: NO to the introduction of digital I.D’s
attributes.additional_details:
There is no need for digital I.D’s we already have NHS numbers when we are born
We already have national numbers when we start work
We already have visual identification allied to driving licence numbers when we pass our tests
We already have visual identification allied to a number with a passport
Stop enough is enough if you don’t have these or any one of these you are not from these lands it DOES NOT stop the illegal immigration’s
attributes.background: Stop digital I.D. Introduction before it gets brought in through parliament

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Do not introduce Digital ID cards" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730194
